scripts.install-node: nvm install 19.8.1 && nvm install 18.15.0 && nvm install 16.20.0
scripts.docker:start: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d redis && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d wait_for_redis
scripts.benchmark-layered-loader: npm run benchmark:layered-loader && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-refresh && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-two-layer-refresh
scripts.benchmark-all: npm run benchmark:async-cache-dedupe && npm run benchmark:layered-loader && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-refresh && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-two-layer-refresh && npm run benchmark:no-dedupe
